author: AETerry
title: Just wasn't for me...
review:
I was initially excited by the Vidyo series and all of the colourful minifigures featured with it.

$19.99 for this set just doesn't feel worth it. Now maybe if I had done the interactive of the music videos with this, that would be a different story.

In the end, this is a glorified collectible minifigure with it's own special case and storage space behind to store all the 2x2 tile pieces for the various songs and singles.

Building the Container Base and the back was somewhat fun. That's a good unicorn design and use of the pieces.

The Unicorn minifigure is what drew me to buy this set in the first place.

In the long run, this just feels lackluster. and not for me.
